2:
--------------------
Text: Fliper:  The band has received many compliments as well as criticism after performing in the clothes of a priest, a nun and a Ku Klux Klan member (in green colour to stay away from the ideology of the organisation) during one of the first concerts.
Triplets:<Fliper
3:
--------------------
Text: Fliper:  Fliper was also popular for using a rubber doll during their concerts at the beginning of their career.
Triplets:<Fliper
5:
--------------------
Text: Fliper:  The third single from the album, which was a parody of the popular talent TV show Idol series, has encountered a big interest due to this fact.
Triplets:<Fliper
